duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple projects for edBridge Partners’ clients, ensuring high-quality service aligned with their missions.
Plan and execute project-specific work plans to ensure timely and accurate completion of all project tasks.
Create project plans, including deliverables, activities, timelines, and budgets.
Facilitate regular project meetings and prepare meeting notes, action items, and schedules.
Lead communication with stakeholders and team members through the completion of projects.
Provide scheduled and on-demand status reports and updates to senior leadership.
Advise leadership team when contracts are to be renewed or amended.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and a minimum of seven years of applicable experience, or an equivalent blend of education and professional background.
At least four years of project management experience managing medium to large complex projects and related project management skills.
Experience with one or more Project Management software platforms - MS Project, Asana, Smartsheet, Jira, Basecamp, etc.
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with demonstrated experience in developing and delivering formal and informal presentations and leading client meetings.
Ability to work independently with little supervision and willingness to do the work that needs to be done as part of a small team.
Experience in education is a plus.
Master’s Degree in any discipline is a plus.
PMP or equivalent professional project management certification is a plus.
Familiarity with educational research, data operations, and analytical decision-making is a plus.
Skilled in the use of Microsoft Office, Google Suite, and common remote business tools like Zoom, Teams, Doodle, SurveyMonkey and others.
